Title: Willy Wonka & the Chocolate Factory
Overview: When eccentric candy man Willy Wonka promises a lifetime supply of sweets and a tour of his chocolate factory to five lucky kids, penniless Charlie Bucket seeks the golden ticket that will make him a winner.
Keywords: chocolate, factory worker, based on novel, candy, tv addicted person, overweight child, grandfather grandson relationship, factory, musical, single, teacher
production_companies: Paramount Pictures, David L. Wolper Productions
Cast: Gene Wilder, Jack Albertson, Peter Ostrum
